name: Caspid
introduce: Capsid is an NFT derivative protocol that empowers NFT owners to issue “Non-Fungible Rights” to generate income from NFT derivatives & services. By building utility-anchored protocols, providing developer friendly APIs, and empowering user facing products, Capsid strives to enrich utilities of NFTs, and hence expands use cases and adoption of digital assets.Capsid is an NFT derivative protocol that empowers NFT owners to issue “Non-Fungible Rights”( including but not limited to collabs, derivatives, merch, renting and membership) to generate income from NFT derivatives & services, . By building utility-anchored protocols, providing developer friendly APIs, and empowering user facing products, Capsid strives to enrich utilities of NFTs, and hence expands use cases and adoption of digital assets.
